tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>Important!!!</> -> Press <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Press F1-4</> or hold <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Reload</> button to access everthing!





















<TextStyle.Yellow>If you notice a problem, something is out of balance or if you have some wishes, please let us know!</>

tab4.text1:
- 10x EXP
- 10x Farming
- 10x Taming (5x with 2x eat)
- 40x Maturation | 20x Hatching
- 15x Item stack | RawPrimeMeat up to 5
- 20x Weight for Player/Dino
- 3 man Tribe + 1 Alliance
- No Mindwipe cooldown
- Maximum wild dino level 150
- Maximum player level 105 (without chib i etc.)
- Auto Engram unlock (all engrams)
- No movement speed leveling
- Cave building allowed (6x structure damage in caves)
- Turrets limit 150
- Itemclamp Near offi (Weapon 400% | Armor Flak 700% | Saddle Rex 175% | Stego 100%)
- 30 sec PVP respawn cooldown (not stacking) for YEET actions
- No building on spawn points
- Force wild dino respawn on server restart is enabled
tab4.text2:
- Orp is a placeable structure
- 20 foundations range
- 50% damage reduce (also to dinos)
- Turrets deal 50% more damage
- turned on after 45min
- Orp bubble is invisible for others
- No placemant in caves
- Penalty for go offline while Raidflagged +120min
- Orp get deactivated after 5 days if no tribemember logged in
tab4.text3:
Server restart <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">every day 6 AM</>

- Only wild dino get wiped after restart
- NO WIPE for tamed dinos, boss dinos (tek cave), sleeping dinos, and dinos actively being tamed

tab5.text1:
- Outside of a raid, a person may not be held captive for longer than 30 minutes
- In a raid it is 60 minutes

- Teaming above the maximum number of alliances (1) and excessive trading, is not allowed


<TextStyle.Orange>Not a Rule but Please</>
- In PvP it can quickly become toxic, but keep a cool head and don't constantly insult.
- Every player who likes to play PvP can only have fun playing PvP if other players are also playing. So don't kill everything indiscriminately in a raid or foundation wipe others just because you can. If dinos or players are no longer a threat to you, let them have what you don't need anyway. That way you might have a rematch next time :D



Is something unclear? Let us know!
tab5.text2:
<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Press F4</> or hold <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Reload</> button

- You can report other players for cheating or breaking the rules
- Or create a Ticket on our Discord
- Or just to ask the Admins/Mods for help
